backgroundInformationList.description: Notice of Passing of By-law - 150 Laird Drive

noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law No. 332-2020 to designate 150 Laird Drive (Don Valley West, Ward 15) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

otherReferenceList.description: By-law 332-2020 - To designate the property at 150 Laird Drive as being of cultural heritage value or interest
